00100         return NULL;
00101      cdCanvas *ocv = canvas;
00102      canvas = cv;
00103      return ocv;
00104   }
00105   cdCanvas* getCanvas(void){
00106      if (canvas_mapped == true)
00107         return canvas;
00108      else
00109         return NULL;
00110   }
00111   int activateCanvas(void){

00114      else
00115         return CD_ERROR;
